Available building blocks

  • Linear ditopic cores (L2)
  • Triangular tritopic cores (T3)
  • Square tetratopic cores (S4)
  • Hexagonal hexatopic cores (H6)
  • Connection Groups (Q)
  • Functional Groups (R)
